text: is a town in the middle of Saitama Prefecture in Japan. Ranzan Keikoku Gorge is a forested area near Mount Ohira. The Tsukigawa River runs through it.Japan-travelguide.com, Ranzan Keikoku . title: Ranzan, Saitama
